required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Apatinib Mesylate Tablets Combined With Tegio Capsule for First-line Refractory Patients With Late-stage Gastric Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: A Study on Efficacy and Safety of Apatinib Mesylate Tablets Combined With Tegio Capsule for First-line Refractory Patients With Late-stage Gastric Cancer

brief_summary.textblock: This is a single-arm, interventional study aimed to observe the efficacy and safety of Apatinib Mesylate tablets combined with Tegio capsule for first-line refractory patients with late-stage gastric cancer or gastro-esophageal junction cancer.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Apatinib Mesylate tablets combined with Tegio capsules

intervention.intervention_name: Apatinib Mesylate tablets combined with Tegio capsules
intervention.description: Apatinib Mesylate tablets+ Tegio capsules, p.o.
intervention.arm_group_label: Apatinib Mesylate tablets combined with Tegio capsules
